<center> <h1> Synthesis of models mentionned in Spicknall`s review </h1> </center>

\begin{aligned}

\frac{dS}{dt} &=- {\beta_w} \times({I_w} + {d}\times{q}\times{I_{wz}})\times{S} - {\beta_z} \times({I_z} + {d}\times{q}\times{I_{wz}})\times{S} + {\gamma} \times {I_z} + {\gamma}\times(1 - {\epsilon})\times{I_w} + {\gamma `} \times {\epsilon} \times {I_w} \\

\frac{dI_w}{dt} &={\beta_w} \times({I_w} + {d}\times{q}\times{I_{wz}})\times{S} + {r}\times({\beta_w} - {u}\times{\rho}\times{\epsilon}\times{I_w} - {\beta_z})\times{I_w}\times{I_z} + {d}\times{\gamma} \times {I_{wz}} - {d}\times{\beta_z} \times({I_z} + {q}\times{I_{wz}})\times{I_w} - {\gamma}\times(1 - {\epsilon})\times{I_w} - {\gamma `}\times {\epsilon} \times {I_w} - {\phi}\times(1-{\epsilon})\times{I_z}\\

\frac{dI_z}{dt} &={\beta_z} \times({I_z} + {d}\times{q}\times{I_{wz}})\times{S} + {u}\times{\rho}\times{\epsilon}\times{I_w} - {r}\times({\beta_w} - {\beta_z})\times{I_w}\times{I_z} + {d}\times{\gamma}\times(1 - {\epsilon})\times{I_{wz}} + {d}\times{\gamma `} \times {\epsilon} \times {I_{wz}} - {\beta_w} \times({I_w}+{d}\times{q}\times{I_{wz}})\times{I_z} - {\gamma} \times {I_z} + {\phi}\times(1-{\epsilon})\times{I_z}\\

\frac{dI_{wz}}{dt} &={d}\times({\beta_z} \times({I_z} + {q}\times{I_{wz}})\times{I_w} + {\beta_w} \times({I_w} + {q}\times{I_{wz}})\times{I_z} - {\gamma} \times {I_{wz}} -{\gamma}\times(1 - {\epsilon})\times{I_{wz}} - {\gamma `} \times {\epsilon} \times {I_{wz}}) \\

 \end{aligned}
